entry.title: A standardized DevOps pipeline at RBC improves the developer experience and drives global business value
entry.summary: In 2019, Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) began a project to automate a standardized DevOps pipeline that had been manual and leveraged an older library management system
entry.content: In 2019, Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) began a project to automate a standardized DevOps pipeline that had been manual and leveraged an older library management system for source code management. Then, as happened to all, the pandemic came along and while it extended the project, it also gave RBC time to develop and implement a homegrown application on-boarding tool they named Helios to interact with and drive standardization with GitHub read more...

entry.title: Welcome to the IBM Z DevOps Acceleration Program News
entry.summary: On the IBM Z DevOps Acceleration Program News page, you will find links to relevant news and blogs that showcase and explain the value of our Git workflow-based CI/CD solution.
entry.content:
On the IBM Z DevOps Acceleration Program News page, you will find links to relevant news and blogs that showcase and explain the value of our Git workflow-based CI/CD solution.

Bookmark this page as we update it regularly with new content: https://ibm.github.io/z-devops-acceleration-program/news

entry.title: A "no-baggage" approach to new Mainframe development practices
entry.summary: Transitioning a whole delivery process for applications to a new set of tools and practices can represent a real challenge if the attempt is to reproduce design from the past and keep things as they were as close as possible. A "no-baggage" strategy means read more...
entry.content: Transitioning a whole delivery process for applications to a new set of tools and practices can represent a real challenge if the attempt is to reproduce design from the past and keep things as they were as close as possible. A "no-baggage" strategy means read more...

entry.title: Transformation of library manager SysProgs into DevOps Engineers
entry.summary: Delivering software and services at the speed that the market demands, requires IT teams to work together, and iterate rapidly. To be responsive to business demands, enterprise development teams need to read more...

entry.title: Why Git and why ONLY Git?
entry.summary: Git has been accepted as the primary Source Control Management (SCM) in the enterprise, open-source & startup world. It is a typical “winner takes all” scenario, where very little is left to debate read more...
entry.content: Git has been accepted as the primary Source Control Management (SCM) in the enterprise, open-source & startup world. It is a typical “winner takes all” scenario, where very little is left to debate read more...
